Name: Base Station License, A.C.A Car/Limo Service, Queens
Title: A Local Law in relation to the approval of a determination by the Taxi and Limousine Commission to approve an application by A.C.A. Car & Limo Service, Co. Inc., and also identified as ACA Car/Limo Service Co Inc, ACA CL Svc Co Inc and ACA Car & Limo Srvc Co Inc, for the renewal of a license to operate a base station in the borough of Queens.
Text:
Be it enacted by the Council as follows:

	Section one.  The determination by the Taxi and Limousine Commission to approve an application by A.C.A. Car & Limo Service, Co. Inc., and also identified as ACA Car/Limo Service Co Inc, ACA CL Svc Co Inc and ACA Car & Limo Srvc Co Inc. for the renewal of a license to operate a base station at 66-20 99th Street in the borough of Queens is hereby approved. 
	ï¿½2. This local law shall take effect immediately. 

LS#910
